title: Ciara and Russell Wilson become Beyonce and Jay Z for Halloween 2019
text:
Iconic (Picture: Ciara, Instagram)

Ciara and Russell Wilson hit the mark with their Halloween costumes this year after becoming Beyonce and Jay Z, and fans had to look twice thanks to their near identical outfits.

The Wilsons decided to recreate the iconic moment from Beyonce and Jay Z’s Apes**t music video, where they stood in front of the famous Mona Lisa painting, and later a portrait of Meghan Markle, the Duchess of Sussex.

However, instead of a Mona Lisa replicate or Meghan, Ciara and Russell opted for their heroes Michelle and Barack Obama.

Basically, one power couple to another.

Ciara, 34, channeled every ounce of Beyonce with her fierce pout and similar hairstyle, while Russell, 30, was serving Jay Z hair with a small afro. However, he put his own spin on the powder blue suit by leaving the buttons on his jacket undone to serve chest. Jay Z could never.

Advertisement

Advertisement

In the caption, CiCi praised her pals and said: ‘From the Wilsons to the Carters to the Obamas… Much Love & Respect. We goin Ape $#!% #HappyHalloween.’

Reacting to the accuracy of their Halloween looks, one fan commented: ‘Nailed it,’ while another said: ‘YAAAASSSSS YALL DID THAT [sic].’

One fan cheered: ‘Omg Russell took me out with the hair though…they ate this look,’ and another laughed: ‘Lmaooo Russell face is my MOOD tuhhhh day [sic].’

‘NAILED IT‼️‼️ Imitation is the greatest form,’ another said.

Taken aback by Bey and Jay’s doppelgangers, one admitted: ‘I was so confused for 3 seconds lol.’

Ciara and Russell aren’t the only ones in the family slaying their Halloween looks, as their children Future, five, and Sienna, two, took it to the next level.

The siblings went as The Jackson 5 (but two) and wore the cutest, matching pink outfits complete with feathers and bold prints. They even delivered a little performance to ABC and, yep, our hearts melted.

We’re yet to see Beyonce and Jay Z’s Halloween looks this year but if they went as CiCi and Russ, we’d definitely be spooked.

description: Ciara and Russell Wilson recreated Beyonce and Jay Z's outfits from their Apes**t music video.
